types.html:
pacte civil de solidarité m (plural pactes civils de solidarité)

  1. civil solidarity pact, civil union, civil partnership (legal union established in France in 1999 to regulate the relationships of unmarried cohabiting couples, different-sex or same-sex)
    Synonyms: union civile, partenariat enregistré, partenariat civil
trans: civil solidarity pact, civil union, civil partnership
